resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103150</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103150</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101333</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Emperors of the Extreme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaiser des Übermaßes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Empereurs de l'extrémité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Emperors do extremo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imperatori dell'estremo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτοκράτορες του άκρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Emperadores del extremo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Emperor penguins can flourish in locales where few other animals roam. But scientists now wonder if they can adapt to a new threat: climate change.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kaiser Penguins können in den Schauplätzen 
blühen, in denen wenige andere Tiere durchstreifen. Aber 
Wissenschaftler wundern jetzt, sich wenn sie einer neuen Drohung sich 
anpassen können: Klimaänderung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pingouins d'empereur peuvent s'épanouir dans 
les lieux où peu d'autres animaux errent. Mais les 
scientifiques se demandent maintenant s'ils peuvent s'adapter à une 
nouvelle menace : changement de climat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os pinguins de emperor podem florescer nos locales
onde poucos outros animais vagueiam. Mas os cientistas querem 
saber agora se puderem se adaptar a uma ameaça nova: mudança 
do clima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I penguins di imperatore possono fiorire in 
locales in cui pochi altri animali vagano. Ma gli scienziati ora
si domandano se possono adattarsi ad una nuova minaccia: 
cambiamento di clima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αυτοκράτορας penguins μπορεί να ακμάσει στα 
σύνολα τοπικής προσαρμογής όπου λίγα άλλα ζώα περιπλανώνται. 
Αλλά οι επιστήμονες αναρωτιούνται τώρα εάν μπορούν να 
προσαρμοστούν σε μια νέα απειλή: αλλαγή κλίματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los pingüinos de emperador pueden prosperar en 
los locales en donde pocos otros animales vagan. Pero los 
científicos ahora se preguntan si pueden adaptarse a una nueva 
amenaza: cambio del clima.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
FN:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101333</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103150</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/emperors-of-the-extreme</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
